description:
How to play:
Sort the impostors out by colors to make sure everyone is safe.
Just like you do the ball sort.
The impostors will be revealed after you sort them all out.

Features:
Bright and Cute graphics
Teach your kids
1000+ levels to train your brain
Test your IQ
Relax your mind
Antistress

Imposter Sort Puzzle is a cute, fun, and relaxing puzzle game.
It is totally offline and really friendly to everyone.
name: Imposter Sort Puzzle
